title: Research progress of flexible pressure sensor based on MXene materials
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9547-9558
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA07772A, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhigang Hu, Feihu Xie, Yangyang Yan, Hanjing Lu, Ji Cheng, Xiaoran Liu, Jinghua Li
This manuscript summarizes the preparations and potential applications of MXene-associated technology and provides a comprehensive review of the recent development of high-performance flexible pressure sensors based on MXenes materials.
